description.full: This game was classified by the community with the following category scores - Violence=0/3, Sex=0/3, Mature Content=0/3. Avoid filling the board by forming lines of five or more balls of the same color in this addictive game! Try to get the highest score with combo bonus! It can also be played with shapes instead of colored balls. Includes many backgrounds to customize the game.
